article: prosecutors probing the sprawling parmalat scandal seized documents wednesday as they investigated a suspected scheme involving double invoicing , a judicial source said , and the wife of the company 's former top financial official was put under house arrest in parma for suspected money laundering .
abstract: prosecutors in parmalat case seize documents in suspected invoice fraud scheme
